comment: I'll be honest, this class was easy. Dr. Ross though is the most arrogant and rudest professor I have ever met. I would have rather taken a challenging class and had a respectful professor. However, EDUC2120 was only offered online-so I didn't have a choice. Avoid him if possible-if not-it's an Easy A.  Group projects were so-so.
Take this class online! What an easy A!!  Dr. Ross gives great assignments, three are group projects. He is always available for help. GREAT TEACHER!!!

This class is pretty easy.You will need the book for the online quizzes.My only complaint is the 3 annoying group projects with group members that he assigns.  The projects aren't hard, but would be way easier if they were solo.

Dr. Ross online class is a minimal workload and not too hard. He is a very fair grader and will let you re-do assignments to get full credit. One thing- he is extremely moody and can be really mean if you get on his bad side (which you may do completely on accident, like me) don't send him too many emails asking too many questions.

Dr. Ross is a great guy! I took this class online and it was so easy! fun little projects to do with your group members! There really is no use in buying his book though bc you never use it! it was suppose to be a "new" edition, and if you open it and look, all he did was switch the pages around, without changing page #s, so save some $
I LOVED THIS PROF!!!! He made my freshman year in college SOOOOOOOO great and I can not wait to start my education courses so I can take another on of his classes!

He tries to make it easy for you in the classroom because of your field study by only giving you three assignments. Don't underestimate how he will grade your assignments though especially the paper. Overall an easy A, nobody should get below a B due to him - maybe their field experience.

LOVED HIM! great professor. Likes to make everyone happy and keep college fun! assignments included a cook out at his house and visiting an elementary school together. EASY A! i will be looking for any education classes with him the next semesters.
Seriously easy for KSU 1101!
Such an easy class. He's kind of self-important, but he's funny. Our most important assignment was a required cook out at his house. No joke.
HE IS THE BEST TEACHER!!!! REALLY GETS YOU INTERESTED IN EDUCATION PROFESSION. DEFINATELY TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!
Best professor, in my view, teaching diversity!

You need to take this class if you want an easy A (at least for summer semester).  Attendance is mandatory or he deducts letter grades from final grade.  You can turn in any assignment late or redo anything for full credit.  There is time-consuming, yet easy work.  ALOT of group work.  He keeps class very interesting and has lots of funny stories.
Good teacher. I enjoyed taking the class and really got along well with the proffesor. I enjoyed his teaching style, wih more discussions than lecture.
I have never met a teacher who loves his class so much. He was so helpful and always did what was best for the class. He was fun and made class interactive and usually let us out early....LOVED him.
He is a wonderful and very capable professor who puts great emphasis on teaching.

Easy A.  Fast paced.  Covers lots but depends on student contributions for substance a bit much.  Lots of work but not difficult.  Funny and interesting.  If you don't like his style, you really need to change majors.

On top of his subject. He gives practical information that works in a classroom environment. Willing to help students excel. GO TO CLASS! His assignments are time consuming because of content but worthwhile. Participate in classroom discussions.
VERY type A personality, he can be moody, but if he likes you you pass, if he doesn't like you you fail.   He has too much personal agenda.
Awesome Teacher!!!
Absolutely agree with previous comment. Plus he is very moody and a ****.

Minimal teaching and way too much personal stuff about his kid, ex wife, bad haircut, etc. etc. Spent way too much class time on trivial details to assignments and too little time on real issues of today's environment in classrooms.
Great class. Take him if you can. Need to be professional and come to class. If you do that and the work required you should make an A.
The class was awesome...show up to class on time, do the little work required and you will have an easy A. He is hilarious!!! Take him if you can!!!
He was the BEST teacher and made it a fun and easy semester. *****TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!!**** Make sure that you show up to class the more you miss the lower your grade.
